entities.name: severus snape
entities.description: Severus Snape is greeted with a low whisper when Harry enters the house.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry Apparates onto the top step and thinks that Death Eaters might have caught a glimpse of his exposed elbow.

entities.name: death eaters
entities.description: Death Eaters are mentioned as potential witnesses to Harry's momentary exposure.

entities.name: daily prophet
entities.description: Harry clutches a stolen copy of the Daily Prophet in his hand.

entities.name: mrs. black
entities.description: Mrs. Black is mentioned as someone Harry wants to be out of earshot of when he calls down from the stairs.

relationships.description: Harry thinks that Death Eaters might have caught a glimpse of his exposed elbow when he Apparated onto the top step.
Severus Snape greets Harry with a low whisper when he enters the house.
